title: Heavenly devilled eggs
ingredients: ['12 medium eggs', '175g (6oz) virtually-fat-free fromage frais', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '40g (1½oz) finely chopped green pepper', '40g (1½oz) finely chopped red pepper', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '3 tbsp finely chopped parsley', 'paprika to dust']
